name: Pounce!
description:
You are a lion, prowling through the savanah. Hungry. But you seek a taste and smell too elusive. You have to...POUNCE on that opportunity!

Little Game Jam game from way back when that I never handed in - but thought turned out quite well.

Be a Lion, Pounce through 3 Areas - and get to that elusive tastet you so long for!

This game might get updates and additional levels.

Controlls:
Pounce - Spacebar or Mouse Click
Restart Level - R
